name: DUCKTIME
description:
You're alone with a jammed gun that sometimes shoots rubber ducks.

Kill as many red blobs as possible before your inevitable death. Don't feed the rubber ducks to the blobs or they grow in size.

Movement: WASD
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: You can't, it's jammed.

Get ready to 

DUCKTIME

Made for the Rigid Jam 21 in 2 hours.
